name: Launches from SpaceX
author: Yugensoft

sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin from Admin -> Plugins -> Add New -> Search for ‘spacex’ -> Click install now
  2. Set up the widget from Admin -> Appearance -> Widgets -> Drag SpaceX launches into the sidebar
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin from Admin -> Plugins -> Add New -> Search for ‘spacex’ -> Click install now
  2. Set up the widget from Admin -> Appearance -> Widgets -> Drag SpaceX launches into the sidebar

Is this or the API it uses associated with SpaceX in any way?

No, the r-spacex API is maintained by hobbyists.
sections.description:
Show your visitors upcoming and recent SpaceX launches in your sidebar.

Uses the r-spacex API: https://github.com/r-spacex/SpaceX-API

short_description: Show your visitors upcoming and recent SpaceX launches in your sidebar. Uses the r-spacex API: https://github.com/r-spacex/SpaceX-API
